title: Mode
description: Configure how AGIME interacts with tools and extensions

autonomous.label: Autonomous
autonomous.description: Full file modification capabilities, edit, create, and delete files freely.

manual.label: Manual
manual.description: All tools, extensions and file modifications will require human approval

smart.label: Smart
smart.description: Intelligently determine which actions need approval based on risk level

chatOnly.label: Chat only
chatOnly.description: Engage with the selected provider without using tools or extensions.
